settings.title: Settings
settings.promptTemplatesDesc: Templates applied when sending queries to LLMs.
settings.promptTemplatesHint: will be replaced with your question. Select a template in the search bar before sending.
settings.exportAllTemplatesDesc: Templates for wrapping combined LLM responses. Useful for pasting into another LLM to analyze or compare all responses at once.
settings.exportAllTemplatesHint: will be replaced with the exported conversations. Select a template when exporting to wrap the output.
settings.templatePlaceholder: Use {query} as placeholder for your query
settings.templateQueryRequired: Template must include {query} as a placeholder for the user's input.
settings.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
settings.defaultExportNameDesc: Set a default name for saved exports. Leave blank for auto-generated names.
settings.themeDesc: Choose a color theme for the interface
settings.automationDisabledTip: Automation disabled — queries will not be sent automatically
settings.automationEnabledTip: Automation enabled — queries will be sent automatically

batch.templateActivePlaceholder: Type your query (template "{{name}}" will be applied)
batch.noSitesEnabled: No sites enabled. Go to Settings to enable LLM sites.

history.title: History
history.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all history?

error.captchaDetected: Security challenge detected. Please complete it in the iframe or open in new tab.

placeholder.title: Batch Search is in floating mode
placeholder.description: Close the floating window to return batch search here

sidepanel.tip: Type a query and click Batch Search to compare responses from multiple LLMs side by side.

disclaimer.tos: This tool may violate the Terms of Service of embedded LLM sites. Use at your own risk.
